name: Point Financial, Inc.
overview:
Point Financial provides venture debt and leasing to companies that are VC backed.

While many of the companies we fund are pre profit, they all have revenues. We provide a bridge to either profitability or the next equity round. We provide senior secured debt or equipment leasing, either purchase money or sale/leaseback.
